attributes.action: Replace the Emirates A380 Model At the Entrance to London Heathrow Airport And Compulsary PurchaseThe Land! As this is a Gate Way into Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Roundabout is a Gate Way to Britain
And we must stop Foriegn Airlines/companies etc, Using the roundabout at the entrance to the tunnel to London Heathrow Airport
for their own advertising?
This particular space is where the model of Concorde sat for nearly 2 decades and was retired to Brooklands Museum
Approx 1 year ago,

And now under construction in its place!

Is a brand new model of an Airbus A380,

In the Livery of the  United Arab Emirates Airline.

Now Being that this Plot of land (the Roundabout) belongs to BAA, They can rent it out to whomever they please?

But once upon a time this whole Airport was Owned by the Government and they sold it off to the private sector Namely  BAA/HAL
who were eventually sold on to the Spanish Company Furogul or something like that?

However My Point that i am trying to make is that this particular roundabout should be Compulsary Re-Purchased By our Government
and Handed over to English Heritage!
So that a Model of a British Flagged  Aircraft  ie British Airways/Virgin Atlantic etc
or Model of a British Made Aircraft  ie the return of Concorde/a Spitfire/Huricane etc Goes Back in there!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
